title: 05/11/2021 - Best of The Herd
itunes:title: 05/11/2021 - Best of The Herd
description:
Colin reacts to Tim Tebow's return to the NFL and why we should all be highly skeptical of his chances to succeed after not playing in the league for 8 years. He talks about Russell Westbrook's record breaking night and why this turned out to be "on brand" for the former MVP. He also warns the Green Bay Packers about where they could be headed if the run Aaron Rodgers out of town. Plus, Vikings WR Justin Jefferson joins the show to talk about their reported interest in drafting a new QB to replace Kirk Cousins.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
